name: saga-orchestration-example
description: Ejemplo de microservicios con RabbitMQ y patrón Saga de Orquestación

scripts.start: concurrently "npm run start:orchestrator" "npm run start:order" "npm run start:inventory" "npm run start:payment"
scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:orchestrator" "npm run dev:order" "npm run dev:inventory" "npm run dev:payment"
scripts.install-deps: concurrently "cd shared && npm install" "cd orchestrator && npm install" "cd order-service && npm install" "cd inventory-service && npm install" "cd payment-service && npm install"
